Anne's Apothecary Aloe Daily Comfort Gel

Brand: Anne's Apothecary

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Deionized Aqua, Organic Aloe Leaf Juice, Witch Hazel Water, Carbomer, Triethanolamine, Tetrasodium Glutamate Diacetate, Panthenol, Allantoin, Hydroxyethyl Cellulose, Glycerin, Phenoxyethanol, Caprylyl Glycol
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
